### Graduate Students

The Department of Marine Science offers Master of Science (MS) and Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) degree programs. More information about graduate study at UTMSI can be found here: <https://marinescience.utexas.edu/academics#graduate>

### Undergraduate Students

UT Austin undergraduates may work on an independent research project with the Lever Lab through the Semester By The Sea program.
